data.text: @LibDems @EdwardJDavey Hey, here’s a thought, why not make testing illegal… It’s totally unnecessary, and a waste of time, and only fuels the sense of panic amongst the otherwise well population…
@LibDems @EdwardJDavey Barking up the wrong tree! Still pushing the NW0 agenda I see. Rip LibDem party
@LibDems @EdwardJDavey Make them available on prescription so remain free for all the protected groups too?

@LibDems @EdwardJDavey Thank you for championing this! 

My mum and I are unpaid carers, and on top of our concerns and needs being ignored by the government, being charged for tests is just another slap in the face.
